name: Sprongus Dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc "set -e; mkdir -p ~/.codex ~/.claude ~/.config/gh; sudo chown -R node:node ~/.codex ~/.claude ~/.config/gh; chmod 700 ~/.codex ~/.claude ~/.config/gh; sudo usermod -aG docker node; pnpm install"
postStartCommand: bash -lc "sudo chown -R node:node ~/.codex ~/.claude ~/.config/gh || true; (docker network inspect sprongus_net >/dev/null 2>&1 || sudo docker network create sprongus_net >/dev/null 2>&1); sudo docker network connect sprongus_net $(hostname) >/dev/null 2>&1 || true"
